parameters.name: CasterName
parameters.description: The name of the new production studio.

parameters.name: ClientToken
parameters.description:
The client token that is used to ensure the idempotence of the request.

You can use the client to generate a token, but you must make sure that the token is unique among different requests. The token can contain only ASCII characters and cannot exceed 64 characters in length.

parameters.name: SrcCasterId
parameters.description: The ID of the original production studio.
